Issue.summary: As a CLI user or Agent I should have access to a well defined schema for claims/proofs
Issue.description: 1. Implement and publish a way for claims and proofs to be shared. 1.1 The CLI should use a well defined schema for claims and proofs.2. Publishing the selected way3. Nathan must pass off on this POA4. Should have a serialization example for: claim offerclaim requestproof offerproof requesth2.
